phrases.text: Brazilâ€™s first internet connection was established in 1988.
In 1991, the first Brazilian websites went online.
The academic network RNP connected universities across Brazil.
In 1995, the internet became publicly available in Brazil.
By the 2000s, Brazil was one of the fastest-growing internet markets.
Social media transformed Brazilian online culture in the 2010s.
Brazil is now among the largest internet user populations in the world.
